trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Quroll Ja is eager to teach you about blessed siblings.
TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_000<tab>You're part of the Third Promise's retinue, aren't you? I was glad to hear you express an interest in our ways.
TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_001<tab>Perhaps you'd be interested in learning more about our culture? I could teach you, if you'd like.
TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_002<tab>The statue behind me holds great cultural significance to our people. Feel free to ask about anything that catches your interest.
TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_003<tab>The statue behind me represents much and more about Mamook. Take a look from over there and I'll explain whatever you're curious about.

TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>Study the statue of blessed siblings. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target a section and learn more details with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_004<tab>In conclusion, this statue symbolizes the heart of Mamook, down to the stone it was carved from─the very stone left by the Yok Huy who ruled these lands long ago.
TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_005<tab>Our predecessors reimagined the structures abandoned here and built the city you see today, creating a future all their own.
TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_006<tab>...Unlike their descendants, now shackled to a past, land, and practice that have poisoned Mamook's prospects. I wonder if we are truly capable of change.
TEXT_KINGZD101_05100_QUROLLJA_000_007<tab>But no─as our ancestors found their way, so will we. As we seek to discover what we might yet become, I pray you never forget all that Mamook once was.
